text: Ojo kofironi Makka dar rui zamin namegardand, to ʙuʙinand, monandi Odu Samud va amsoli onhoro, ki nisʙat az kofironi Makka nerue ʙestar dostaand, oqiʙati onho ci sud? Hec ciz dar osmonhovu zamin nest, ki Allohro notavon sozad. Haroina, U dono ast ʙa kirdori ʙandagonas va tavonost ʙar halok kardani onho
